description: Want to know the real reasons why Minority Businesses fail? In this course you will identify the 3 elements on Why Minority Businesses Fail. Throughout this course you will get real life examples that support the failures presented in 17 enhanced lectures! As a student, you will also gain valuable insight on how to avoid these failures to truly grow a successful business as a minority. The course is a presentation facilitated by your Cross-Culture expert Chris Williams.
title: Why Minority Businesses Fail (And How You Can Succeed)
instructors: Keynote Speaker|Trainer|Coach Christopher Williams, Michael Robert Moore
